<p>never do this</p>

<pre><code>} catch (ClientProtocolException e) {
     // TODO Auto-generated catch block
} catch (IOException e) {
     // TODO Auto-generated catch block
}
</code></pre>

<p>Look here to see how to do it right: <a href="http://source.android.com/source/code-style.html" rel="nofollow">http://source.android.com/source/code-style.html</a></p>
